results: Company policies are guidelines that help employers deal with the health, safety and accountability of employees, as well as their interactions with customers or clients.
Company policies put in writing what you expect from your employees. These may be related to performance, values or behavior.

Personnel Management Policies: Equal Opportunity Policy (EOP), Employee Code of Conduct, Attendance and Time-off Policies, Disciplinary Action Policy, Employee Complaint/Grievance Policies, Fraternization Policy, Compensation and Benefits Policy
Safety and Health Policies: Workplace Health and Safety Policy, Substance Abuse Policy, Face Mask Policy (COVID-19 related), Inclement Weather Policy
Operational Policies: Work Schedule and Rest Period Policy, Remote Work Policy, Travel Policy, Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) Policy
Security and Compliance Policies: Workplace Security Policy, Ethics Policy, Non-retaliation Policy
These policies serve multiple purposes: Setting clear expectations, Ensuring legal compliance, Protecting the business, Maintaining accountability, Promoting fair treatment of employees
